channel.title: Bank and Paypal
channel.description: I have money in my bank, and i want to buy this laptop off ebay ;) So, i have vertified paypal, do i need to get my banked money into my paypal before i buy? Or do they do it automatically.

item.title: Bank and Paypal
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“SonGoku, post:3, topic:207800”]How do i add the funds lol.
Cause i go to add funds, and it makes me type in my bank info agian. Although i already am vertified. Iv emailed them like 3 times and i got no response :([/quote]
paypal auto debits my bank when it needs money, they will allow you to continue purchasing the item working on paypal credit as long as your verified.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank and Paypal
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Assuming you have added a bank account to your paypal, you can send them funds from your bank automatically but it will take a while until they receive the payment, depending where you live. In Canada it takes 8 business days, I think it’s ~4-6 for USA.

Usually I just add the funds to my paypal first, then I use that to buy the items.

Read full topic
